project_descr: The Development of a National Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) Policy project seeks to assist the Ministry of Trade and Industry (MTI) in the development of a national CSR policy to increase the competitiveness of the local private sector.

outputs.output_descr: Development of a National Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) Policy project seeks to provide a mechanism to further increase the competitiveness of the local private sector to increase the sustainability of its operation

project_title: development natl corporate social responsibility policy
